We define the Zariski site on CommRingCatᵒᵖ by inducing the topology from Scheme, and then we show that this topology is equal to the one generated by the pretopology of standard covers, where we cover Spec R by Spec R[1/fⱼ] where (f₁, ⋯, fₙ) = R.
